name: neighbourhood.io
author: Sanskript Solution, Inc.

sections.description:
neighbourhood.io is a WordPress plugin for displaying beautiful chart of of Canadian Neighbourhoods Demographics using geographic coordinates.

The plugin uses Google Visualization API to render charts, which support cross-browser compatibility.

Documentation

neighbourhood.io uses Shortcode syntax to display charts.

[neigbourhoodio-chart lat="49.1231231" lon="-79.2664966"]

Parameters

  • lat: Latitude component of location.
  • lon: Longitude component of location

Contact Us

  • Support (http://support.neighbourhood.io)
  • Web Site (http://www.neighbourhood.io)
sections.installation:
1. Install SoldPress either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Click the Settings -> neighbourhood.io Add your subscription key.
  3. Click Save
sections.faq:
Where do I get a subscription key?

Sign up for a subscription key at http://www.neighbourhood.io

What are the data segments currently available?

Age, Gender,Mother Tongue ,Marital Status,Education,Employment,Income,Religion
